summary: Three characters are challenged by live in a poor neighborhood, and they demonstrate to one degree or another, their resilience to follow their dreams.
cast: El Langui|Ovono Candela|Javier I. Bustamante|Elio Toffana|Mala Rodríguez|Juan Navarro|Joaquín Mbomio|Fanny Gatibelza|Alicia Orozco|Abdelali El Aziz|Soufianne Ouaarab|Rubén Castro|Amadou Mactar|Francesc Garrido|Diego Carrasco|Miquel Cors|Faitah Damouh|Mohamed Mabrouk|Cesc Xavier Bienert|Abner Lloveras|Younes Bachir|Koman|El Payo Malo|Josete|Gregorio Guillamón|Ayoub El Hilali|Fausto Marci
director: Director: Santiago Zannou (as Santiago A. Zannou)
title: El truco del manco
